attributes.action: Change the way prescriptions are charged for
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present a person requiring medicines for lifetime treatment is required to pay prescription charges for those medicines. We call for a change so that medicines provided for a lifetime chronic condition are free of charge. However to remain within the spirit of prescription charges, incidental, transient prescriptions would still be chargeable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
